rows.label: tev032601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev032601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Giogion about L's shop.

rows.label: tev032601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev032601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Giogion if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev032601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Giogion if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0001
rows.name:
With enough miranium, it looks like you'll have no
trouble opening slots in your gear, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Once you've found a favorite, you probably want to
bust those slots open and and power it up to the max,
don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0003
rows.name:
That L is a real artist, don't you think?
That's one beauty of a machine...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Do you think I could talk him into designing one that
converts miranium into pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0008
rows.name:
My sister Neraph was on the ship with us, but I haven't
seen her for for months, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0009
rows.name:
Once she finds an object of study, she goes full hermit,
you follow? You don't see her for months, then she
finally emerges from seclusion looking thin and pale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, she sent a message to my comm device about
a company here in the city that picked her up.
I wonder which one it was...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0011
rows.name:
If you see her, tell her to drop by L's shop and say
hello to her brother, if you would?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0027
rows.name: I just saw my sister Neraph for the first time in ages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0028
rows.name:
I hadn't seen her for so long that I practically forgot
what she looked like, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0029
rows.name:
Anyway, I guess some Wrothian was after her or
something? She looked totally exhausted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0030
rows.name:
Since I'm a good brother, I told her she should get out,
exercise more, and build up some some endurance.
All good advice, wouldn't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_JNK1010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev032601_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Giogion about L's shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0031
rows.name:
Ah, it's my favorite artist L! Don't worry, okay?
I'm taking good good care of the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0032
rows.name:
You just get out there and see the sights of Mira,
all right? Light that imagination on fire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0033
rows.name:
I know you'll concoct all kinds of crazy machines inside
that gold mine you you call a brain, won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0034
rows.name:
And the first one will be a machine that converts
miranium into pizza, right? ...Right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032601_MSG0035
rows.name:
Er, that was me doing the subliminal thing,
you know? Pizza machine, please?[ST:wait ]
